item.title: 中东资金缺口有可能推迟初创企业的上市雄心
item.description: 风险投资公司 Global Ventures 的创始人努尔-斯维德（Noor Sweid）表示，由于试图扩大规模的公司缺乏资金，中东地区的初创企业有可能失去发展动力，并面临更长的上市之路。【原文：Startups in the Middle East are at risk of losing momentum and facing a longer path to public listings due to a lack of funding for firms trying to scale, according to Noor Sweid, founder of venture capital firm Global Ventures.】

item.description:

item.title: 日本最大商业游说团体报告加薪幅度超过 5
item.description: 日本最高级别的商业游说团体报告称，其下属公司的工人连续第二年赢得了加薪超过 5%的承诺，这一结果表明，在日益恶化的劳动力紧缺状况的推动下，工资增长势头依然强劲。【原文：Japan’s top business lobby reported that workers at affiliated companies won pledges for pay hikes exceeding 5% for a second consecutive year, an outcome that points to continued momentum in wage increases fueled by the worsening labor crunch.】

item.title: 欧洲杯决赛失利后曼联股价下滑
item.description: 曼联足球俱乐部在欧洲杯决赛中不敌英格兰劲旅托特纳姆热刺队（Tottenham Hotspur），其股价将创下八个多月来的最大跌幅。【原文：Manchester United Plc shares are set for their steepest drop in more than eight months after the football club lost an all-or-nothing Europa League final against English rival Tottenham Hotspur.】

item.title: 美国进口商面临关税期限和海关稽查的 "紧要关头
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普总统暂停征收更高关税的同时，美国企业正面临着越来越大的进口货物压力，他们同时还要应对货物过境时日益复杂的申报规则。【原文：US businesses are under mounting pressure to import goods while President Donald Trump’s higher tariffs are on pause, and they’re simultaneously navigating increasingly complex filing rules when their cargo crosses the border.】

item.title: 特朗普电影关税计划抢走戛纳电影节风头
item.description: 匈牙利电影学院在戛纳电影节的展台上摆放着一本光鲜亮丽的小册子，宣传布达佩斯郊区的一个电影制片厂。在一个模拟的中世纪村庄旁边，有一片木板房群，被描述为 "美国郊区"。这个片场曾被用于拍摄美国制作的电影，如环球公司 2022 年的恐怖喜剧《蒙斯特一家》，而拍摄成本仅为好莱坞的几分之一。【原文：The Hungarian film institute’s booth at the Cannes Film Festival has a glossy brochure promoting a studio complex on the outskirts of Budapest. Next to a mock medieval village, it has a cluster of wood-paneled houses described as an “American suburb.” The set has been used to shoot US productions like Universal’s 2022 horror comedy The Munsters at a fraction of what it would cost to make in Hollywood.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长武契奇称通胀率正缓慢向 2% 目标靠拢
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员鲍里斯-武伊契奇（Boris Vujcic）表示，消费价格增长正朝着 2% 的目标迈进。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Boris Vujcic said consumer-price growth is heading toward the 2% goal.】

item.title: 阿达尼港口公司从星展银行获得约 1.5 亿美元贷款用于资本建设
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，阿达尼港口及经济特区有限公司通过与星展集团控股有限公司（DBS Group Holdings Ltd.）签订双边贷款协议筹集了约 1.5 亿美元资金，这家印度企业集团正在继续恢复贷款人的信心。【原文：Adani Ports & Special Economic Zone Ltd. raised about $150 million through a bilateral loan agreement with DBS Group Holdings Ltd., according to people familiar with the matter, as the Indian conglomerate continues to restore lender confidence.】

item.title: 英国制造业采购经理人指数（PMI）显示，美国关税冲击下英国私营部门再次萎缩
item.description: 一项受到密切关注的调查显示，由于唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税措施打击了海外需求，英国私营企业在 5 月份再次出现萎缩，这加剧了政府与美国贸易协议之间的利害关系。【原文：The UK private sector contracted again in May as Donald Trump’s tariffs hit demand from abroad, according to a closely watched survey, raising the stakes for the government’s US trade deal.】

item.title: 英镑飙升后，英国公司竞相修复货币对冲功能
item.description: 英镑飙升和全球货币波动促使英国董事会开始关注外汇风险。【原文：A surge in the pound and global currency volatility are driving a focus on foreign-exchange risk across Britain’s boardrooms.】

item.title: Qinetiq 看准北约盟国将成为英国国防公司发展的支点
item.description: 英国国防技术公司 Qinetiq Group Plc 计划更多地向北约盟国倾斜，以促进业务发展，因为各国政府都在增加开支，以保卫北约的东翼。【原文：Qinetiq Group Plc, the UK defense technology company, plans to pivot more to NATO allies to boost business as governments ramp up spending to defend the alliance’s Eastern flank.】

item.title: 贸易担忧缓解，德国企业预期改善
item.description: 由于对唐纳德-特朗普总统贸易政策的担忧有所缓解，加上公共支出即将增加，德国企业的经济前景有所改善。【原文：German companies’ economic outlook improved as concern over President Donald Trump’s trade policy eased and an imminent boost to public spending buoyed sentiment.】

item.title: 土耳其中央银行将年底通胀率预测维持在 24
item.description: 土耳其央行维持其年底通胀预期不变，称在其收紧货币政策后，3 月份的货币波动对物价的影响有限。【原文：Turkey’s central bank kept its year-end inflation forecast unchanged, saying the impact of March’s currency volatility on prices was limited following its monetary tightening.】

item.title: 奇货可居：为什么世界各地的房价都在上涨（播客）
item.description: 本周市场的重头戏是债券大跌。基准 10 年期美国国债收益率从上周五的低点跃升了 20 个基点，而 30 年期国债收益率又回到了 5%以上。与此同时，30 年期日本国债收益率创下了自 1999 年有记录以来的新高。英国金边债券、德国债券和澳大利亚债券的利率也在上升。更不寻常的是，美国国债收益率在上升的同时，美元却在走软（这通常是不会发生的）。【原文：This week the big story in markets is the selloff in bonds. Yields on benchmark 10-year US Treasuries jumped 20 basis points from last Friday’s low, while the 30-year rate is back above 5%. Meanwhile, 30-year Japanese government bonds clocked their highest yield since records began in 1999. And rates on UK gilts, German bunds, and Australian bonds are also rising. To make matters even more unusual, US Treasury yields are going up while the dollar is weakening (something that doesn’t usually happ】

item.title: 欧元区私营部门因服务业下滑而意外萎缩
item.description: 5 月份，欧元区私营部门活动意外萎缩，服务业创下 16 个月来最差表现。【原文：Private-sector activity in the euro area unexpectedly shrank in May as services recorded their worst performance in 16 months.】

item.title: 里昂证券称美国股市对贸易战 "天马行空
item.description: 里昂证券（CLSA）首席股票策略师表示，美国股票投资者对贸易战将给企业盈利造成的损害似乎 "天文数字般地沾沾自喜"。【原文：US stock investors appear “astronomically complacent” about the amount of damage the trade war will inflict on corporate earnings, according to CLSA’s chief equity strategist.】

item.title: 新世界获得约 10 家银行贷款再融资支持
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，新世界发展有限公司已获得约10家银行对其875亿港元（约合112亿美元）贷款再融资的承诺，这家资金短缺的建筑商正努力争取在下月底前完成交易。【原文：New World Development Co. has secured commitments from about 10 banks for its HK$87.5 billion ($11.2 billion) loan refinancing, according to people familiar with the matter, as the cash-strapped builder races to complete the deal before the end of next month.】

item.title: 西班牙和葡萄牙下周气温将飙升
item.description: 下周，西欧和南欧部分地区气温将骤升，预计西班牙和葡萄牙的气温最高。【原文：Parts of western and southern Europe will see a jump in temperatures next week, with the hottest conditions expected in Spain and Portugal.】

item.title: 杰米-戴蒙称摩根大通不顾反对进行 CATL 交易是正确的
item.description: 摩根大通（JPMorgan Chase & Co.）首席执行官杰米-戴蒙（Jamie Dimon）表示，尽管美国立法者反对，摩根大通仍为当代安培科技有限公司（Contemporary Amperex Technology Co.摩根大通首席执行官杰米-戴蒙（Jamie Dimon）表示，尽管遭到美国立法者的反对，摩根大通仍为当代安培科技有限公司在香港上市提供了担保，因为华盛顿尚未对这家中国电池制造商实施制裁。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. underwrote Contemporary Amperex Technology Co. Ltd.’s Hong Kong listing despite opposition from US lawmakers, given that Washington hasn’t placed sanctions on the Chinese battery maker, Chief Executive Officer Jamie Dimon said.】

item.title: 英国高等法院阻止达成查戈斯群岛协议
item.description: 周四凌晨，英国高等法院法官发布禁令，阻止英国政府转让查戈斯群岛的所有权。【原文：The UK government was blocked from transferring the ownership of the Chagos Islands after a High Court judge issued an injunction in the early hours of Thursday morning.】

item.title: 德国私营部门因服务业不景气意外下滑
item.description: 德国私营部门 5 月份意外萎缩，服务业两年半来最差的业绩超过了制造业的改善。【原文：Germany’s private sector unexpectedly shrank in May as the worst result for services in two and a half years outweighed improvements in the manufacturing sector.】

item.title: 欧洲盈利复苏支持股市走牛
item.description: 在本报告季，欧洲企业在关税混乱的情况下，基本上都实现了可观的盈利，为该地区股市的牛市提供了支持。【原文：European companies have largely delivered resilient earnings in the face of tariff chaos this reporting season, supporting the bull case for the region’s stocks.】

item.title: 以色列防务公司埃尔比特认为欧洲将带来更多业务
item.description: 以色列最大的国防公司之一的负责人表示，欧洲的销售额将继续增长，并推卸了因加沙战争而要求实施制裁和贸易限制的呼声。【原文：The head of one of Israel’s biggest defense firms said Europe sales will keep growing, shrugging off calls for sanctions and trade restrictions over the war in Gaza.】

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯巨型 Neom 制氢厂努力寻找买家
item.description: 正在沙特阿拉伯 Neom 建设的世界上最大的绿色氢气项目正面临着前途未卜的困境，因为该项目正在努力寻找燃料的国际买家。【原文：The world’s largest green hydrogen project being built in Saudi Arabia’s Neom is facing an uncertain future as it struggles to find international buyers for the fuel.】

item.title: Norinchukin 亏损 126 亿美元，银行希望实现盈利
item.description: Norinchukin 银行在抛售了价值数十亿美元的国债和其他外国债券后，在截至 3 月的一年中报告亏损 1.8 万亿日元（126 亿美元）。【原文：Norinchukin Bank reported a ¥1.8 trillion ($12.6 billion) loss for the year ended in March after dumping billions worth of Treasuries and other foreign bonds.】

item.title: 长江和记确认意大利大亨在港口交易中的主导地位
item.description: 长江和记控股有限公司（CK Hutchison Holdings Ltd.）告诉投资者，意大利亿万富翁詹路易吉-阿庞特（Gianluigi Aponte）的家族企业是一个寻求收购其全球港口的集团的 "主要投资者"，该集团要在各主管部门对交易进行审核后才会进行出售。【原文：CK Hutchison Holdings Ltd. has told investors that Italian billionaire Gianluigi Aponte’s family-run business is the “main investor” of a group seeking to buy its global ports and that the sale won’t proceed until after various authorities vet the deal.】

item.title: 欧盟首次投入 4000 万欧元设立国防专项基金
item.description: 欧盟的投资工具将向一个专门的欧洲防务基金投资 4000 万欧元（4500 万美元），这在该集团寻求提高其军事能力的过程中尚属首次。【原文：The European Union’s investment vehicle is investing €40 million ($45 million) in a dedicated European defense fund, marking a first as the bloc seeks to improve its military capabilities.】

item.title: 卡塔尔财富基金不顾美国担忧继续积极投资中国市场
item.description: 卡塔尔 5,240 亿美元的主权财富基金正继续探索在中国的投资机会，即使地缘政治紧张局势促使全球投资者谨慎行事。【原文：Qatar’s $524 billion sovereign wealth fund is continuing to explore investment opportunities in China, even as geopolitical tensions push global investors to tread carefully.】

item.title: 新加坡总理表示不可能保持地缘政治中立
item.description: 新加坡副总理颜金勇表示，中立是不可能的，这凸显了这个在中美贸易紧张局势中长期寻求在外交上走钢丝的城市国家所面临的日益严峻的挑战。【原文：Singapore’s Deputy Prime Minister Gan Kim Yong said neutrality is not possible, highlighting the rising challenges for the city-state that has long sought to tread a diplomatic tightrope amid US-China trade tensions.】
